messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. May I know your name, please?
Hi Davinci, my name is Rachel.
Nice to meet you, Rachel. How can I assist you today?
I have a question about my account and the KitKat product.
Of course, Rachel. What would you like to know about your account and KitKat?
I wanted to check if there are any special offers or discounts on KitKat available in my account.
Let me check that for you, Rachel. Could you please provide me with your account email or ID?
Sure, my account email is rachel@example.com.

Thank you, Rachel. I see that you have some loyalty points accumulated. Currently, there are no specific discounts on KitKat, but you can use your loyalty points to get a discount on your next purchase.
That's great! How can I use my loyalty points to get the discount?
You can apply your loyalty points at checkout. Just make sure you're logged into your account, and you will see the option to use your points for a discount.
Perfect, thanks for the help, Davinci!
You're welcome, Rachel! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
